    Joins a lobby for a ClientDescriptor requesting it.
    void

    Notifies the MainServerController of a ServerDisconnectMessage sent by the ClientDescriptor
    void
    MainServerController.disconnect(ClientDescriptor client)
    Disconnects a ClientDescriptor from the server and closes its connection, if the ClientDescriptor is connected to a lobby then the lobby handles whatever procedure may be needed.
    void
    LobbyController.disconnectProcedure(ClientDescriptor client)
    Properly disconnects the ClientDescriptor from the Model and removes from the local listener list.
    void

    Enters lobby setup state for a ClientDescriptor requesting it.

    Rejoins the lobby select screen after a lobby controller has closed.

    Opens a room with given type and size for a ClientDescriptor in setup state requesting it.
    void

    Opens a room tied to an unfinished game for a ClientDescriptor that requests it.
    void

    Takes a ClientMessage and sends it to a specific client.
    private TimerTask
    MainServerController.timeoutTask(MainServerController controller, ClientDescriptor client)
    Creates a timeout task for any ClientDescriptor, if the ClientDescriptor doesn't send a ping before it expires, task runs and disconnects the ClientDescriptor.
